mapper.select: SELECT ingredient.ingredient_id AS ingredientId, ingredient.ingredient_name AS ingredientName, ingredient.ingredient_detail_name AS ingredientDetailName, ingredient_avg.ingredient_avg_price AS ingredientAvgPrice, round((ingredient_avg_price - ingredient_avg_previous_price)/ ingredient_avg_previous_price * 100, 2) AS rate FROM ingredient, ingredient_avg WHERE NOT ingredient_avg_previous_price IS NULL && ingredient_avg_date = '2019-01-02' && ingredient.ingredient_id = ingredient_avg.ingredient_id ORDER BY rate LIMIT 5;

SELECT ingredient.ingredient_id AS ingredientId, ingredient.ingredient_name AS ingredientName, ingredient.ingredient_detail_name AS ingredientDetailName, round((ingredient_avg_price - ingredient_avg_previous_price)/ ingredient_avg_previous_price * 100, 2) AS rate FROM ingredient, ingredient_avg WHERE NOT ingredient_avg_previous_price IS NULL && ingredient_avg_date = '2019-01-02' && ingredient.ingredient_id = ingredient_avg.ingredient_id ORDER BY rate DESC LIMIT 5;
